  +
[[Image:PSU_Senior_Section.JPG|right|thumbnail|The Senior Section, dressed to spell out the letter "S"]]
Expansions in [[1969 in sports|1969]], [[1974 in sports|1974]] and [[1976 in sports|1976]] increased capacity to 60,203. In [[1978 in sports|1978]], 16,000 seats were added when the stadium was cut into sections and raised on hydraulic lifts, allowing the insertion of seating along the inner ring of the stadium where the track had previously been located. In [[1980 in sports|1980]], maximum capacity increased to 83,770. An expansion was completed for the [[1991 in sports|1991]] football season, placing an upper deck addition over the north [[end zone]] and raising capacity to over 90,000.
Expansions in [[1969 in sports|1969]], [[1974 in sports|1974]] and [[1976 in sports|1976]] increased capacity to 60,203. In [[1978 in sports|1978]], 16,000 seats were added when the stadium was cut into sections and raised on hydraulic lifts, allowing the insertion of seating along the inner ring of the stadium where the track had previously been located. In [[1980 in sports|1980]], maximum capacity increased to 83,770. An expansion was completed for the [[1991 in sports|1991]] football season, placing an upper deck addition over the north [[end zone]] and raising capacity to over 90,000.
